name: aws-lambda-node-java-starter-node
description: A starter project for AWS CloudFormation and AWS Lambda using NodeJS. Part of a project using Java and NodeJS for AWS Lambda.
author: Sebastian Hesse <info@sebastianhesse.de> (https://www.sebastianhesse.de)

scripts.build: mkdirp target && browserify src/index.js -s default -o target/index.js
